eventList.title: Talk Shop
eventList.blurb: A conversation about the good, the bad, and the crazy of running your own business.

eventList.title: Talk Shop: Debt vs. Equity
eventList.blurb: This panel will feature prominent entrepreneurs, venture capitalists, and lenders to discuss the benefits and challenges of various financing options available to entrepreneurs.

eventList.title: Talk Shop: A Fireside Chat with Scott Harrison of charity:water
eventList.blurb: We'll explore how Scott has built one of the most admired non-profits in the country.

eventList.title: Talk Shop: The Importance of Building a Brand
eventList.blurb: This panel will feature some of the city's leading entrepreneurs and creatives to discuss the importance of brand in business.
